content.heroIntro: AURA4 represents a transformative residential opportunity in the heart of Pilar de La Horadada, a thriving coastal pueblo on Spain's Costa Blanca. Developed by CREATIVITY BUILD, this carefully curated collection of 3 town houses and villas combines contemporary design with practical living, starting from €299,900. Each property features 2-3 spacious bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and built sizes ranging from 91-112m², set on plots of 30-90m². With delivery scheduled for September 2026, AURA4 offers discerning buyers an exceptional value proposition—40% less than comparable Spanish island markets—coupled with strong investment fundamentals. The development is positioned within an established international community where English is commonly spoken, making it an ideal choice for expat buyers seeking quality, location, and financial prudence. Whether you're seeking a primary residence, a holiday retreat, or an investment property with proven rental potential, AURA4 delivers on every front.

locationSection.intro: Pilar de La Horadada is an authentic Mediterranean pueblo that has evolved into a sophisticated residential destination while maintaining its traditional Spanish character. Located in southern Alicante, this coastal community offers the perfect balance between peaceful village living and modern convenience. The area has become particularly attractive to international buyers seeking genuine Spanish culture combined with excellent amenities and accessibility. Within this thriving environment, residents enjoy proximity to pristine beaches, world-class golf facilities, and comprehensive healthcare services. The established expat community means English is widely spoken, and local infrastructure has been developed specifically to serve international residents. The pueblo's strategic position on the Costa Blanca provides unparalleled access to both natural attractions and urban conveniences, making it an increasingly popular choice for discerning property buyers.
